name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled Senior Field Engineer, I bring extensive experience in **troubleshooting**, **problem-solving**, and **customer support**, with a strong focus on **lab automation** and **robotic systems**. My background in **electro-opto-mechanical** systems enhances my ability to deliver effective solutions in complex environments. I excel in **communication** and **team collaboration**, ensuring seamless interactions with stakeholders to drive successful project outcomes.
In addition, I offer 8 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer, specializing in building high-performance solutions across healthcare and financial sectors using modern **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** technologies. My expertise includes **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, as well as deep cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS**. I have led enterprise-grade development that incorporates AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics, real-time data processing, and intelligent automation, all while maintaining compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My knowledge extends to implementing **microservices architecture**, **event-driven systems**, and **CI/CD automation**, reinforced by hands-on experience in developing **machine learning pipelines** and executing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
